settings.text: We are all about the evolution of beauty.

settings.title: Embrace your evolving beauty
settings.text:
Evolve Cosmetics encourages you to embrace and enhance your individual beauty, confidently expressing it as your own.

Evolve wants you to age on your own terms by offering skincare and makeup products tailored to suit your skin at every stage of your life.

Whether you are just starting to worry about wrinkles or are bothered by the way your makeup settles into your fine lines, Evolve has a solution for your maturing skin.

You are an Evolving Beauty and we are your Evolving Beauty Collective. Embrace your life and define your beauty at any age with Evolve Cosmetics.

settings.title: We have one goal
settings.text:
To provide simple but effective skincare and makeup products and solutions for evolving skin.

We age. Everyone ages and with aging comes experience, wisdom, perspective, and acceptance. Aging also brings grey hair, wrinkles, and less collagen production, not to mention hormonal changes that affect the skin and require targeted skincare and cosmetic solutions.

We believe that all women are beautiful, regardless of their age, and we're committed to providing products that support the unique needs of maturing skin. You deserve products that benefit mature skin and are formulated with purposeful ingredients, tested with proven results, and selected due to their unique attributes, innovative technology, and targeted solution offerings.

Whether it's finding the perfect skincare to restore your skin barrier or the right cosmetic to enhance your skin’s natural beauty, we’ve got you covered.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text:
A young and evolving beauty company with rich Herstory.

After decades in the industry with multiple business start-ups and successful product launches to her credit, Sharon Clarke founded Evolve Cosmetics in 2018. Evolve began with a single motivation in mind: to provide women with a simplified approach to skincare and cosmetics.

Sharon wanted to bring positivity to the narrative surrounding a woman’s right to control her beauty in the ageing process. Evolve was born to empower women with the knowledge about their skin needed to age with elegance.

settings.title: A company you can trust
settings.text:
We know the industry, we know
the products and we know what it takes to bring dynamic products to market. We also know skin and we understand what maturing skin needs.

We are connected to Practitioners across Canada and the entire team is well reputed within the industry; Evolve is your trusted ally and the brand to play best supporting actor to your leading role.

The team at Evolve is a dedicated group of skincare and beauty industry
professionals, who hold a diverse portfolio of experience and knowledge
and are driven to serve women, just like you. We actually want to help!

settings.title: Sharon Clarke
settings.text:
Founder

Passionate, experienced and equipped with a genuine motivation to provide the best solutions for skincare and beauty for maturing skin.

settings.title: Marijke Coffa
settings.text:
Director of Sales & Operations

A relationship builder with a keen focus on the customer and practice success equipped to offer business and industry expertise at every organizational level.

settings.title: Julie Reid
settings.text:
Sales Specialist

An entrepreneur at heart who is poised with passion and compassion for providing women with tools that support their skin, build their confidence and change their lives.
